Title: A Craft in Need
Description:
You seem like a skilled crafter. Would you like to fill some crafting orders for fellow adventurers and get rich, rich, rich?

I'll tell you the rules of working with the Artisan's Consortium, then you can pick up Crafting Orders at any crafting station on the Dragon Isles!
ObjectivesText: Speak with Azley to learn about filling Crafting Orders.
RewardText: Great, great, great! Keep it up. There's always more orders to fill!

Objectives.Text: Artisan's Consortium rules learned from Azley
